name: Atherton Venture Partners
overview: Atherton Venture Partners(AVP) invests in healthcare, life science, and information technology companies. Current portfolio holdings focus primarily on companies that develop diagnostic devices, medical treatment procedures, and surgical instruments in the fields of sports medicine, cardiovascular and vascular medicine, as well as radiology and anesthesiology. Information technology investments focus on companies that develop software and operating systems for storage area networks (SANS) as well as Internet security.

funding_round.source_description: Microfabrica Secures $8 Million Funding to Expand Fabrication Facility in Van Nuys, California
